JWT_EXPIRED: JSON Web Token is expired. Try again!
JWT_INVALID: JSON Web Token is invalid. Try again!
ROLE_NOT_ALLOWED: is not allowed to access this resource!
ROLE_CHANGE_NOT_ALLOWED: You are not allowed to change this user's role!
LOGIN_TO_ACCESS: Login first to access this resource!
USERNAME_LENGTH: Username cannot be less than 5 characters or greater than 20 characters!
USERNAME_INVALID: Username cannot contain special characters, only letters and numbers allowed!
EMAIL_READ_ONLY: You cannot change your primary email!
PASSWORD_LENGTH: Password cannot be less than 8 characters!
PASSWORD_WEAK: Your password is too weak, strong password must contain at least 1 small letter, 1 capital letter, 1 number, and 1 special character!
USER_NOT_FOUND: User not found with this email
PASSWORD_RESET_TOKEN: Your password reset token is as follow:
REQUEST_IGNORE: If you have not requested to reset your password, then ignore this email.
PASSWORD_RESET_TOKEN_INVALID: Password reset token is invalid or has been expired!
FIRSTNAME_LENGTH: The firstname cannot be less than 2 characters and not greater than 20 characters!
LASTNAME_LENGTH: The lastname cannot be less than 2 characters and not greater than 20 characters!
HOBBY_LENGTH: The hobby name cannot be less than 3 characters and not greater than 20 characters!
HOBBY_STRING: The hobby name doesn't accept special characters!
